items.title: A Ghost Story (2017)
items.description: A woman gets sent to men's training camp, gets distracted by butterflies, and does no training but somehow still passes and then proceeds to bury herself alive to be with a guy.

items.title: Ghost in the shell (1995)
items.description: A public security officer changes her whole personality for a sentient chat bot she just met.

items.title: John Wick (2014)
items.description: Some thugs decide to beat up a random widower and his dog because they didn't like his attitude after talking to him for 5 minutes at a gas station.

items.title: John Wick: Chapter 4 (2023)
items.description: A French man decides to shut down a hotel chain and threaten a blind man into submission in order to get revenge on a homeless man.

items.title: Renfield (2023)
items.description: A man that likes eating bugs teams up with a cop to escape a violent, toxic relationship with a crippled, iron-deficient narcissist.

items.title: The Butterfly Lovers (2008)
items.description: A woman gets sent to men's training camp, repeatedly gets distracted by butterflies, and does no training but somehow still passes and then proceeds to bury herself alive to be with a guy.

items.title: The Man From Toronto (2022)
items.description: A workout fad genius accidentally helps terrorists get nuclear weapons while trying to celebrate his wife's birthday.

items.title: The Shawshank Redemption (1994)
items.description: A convicted murderer harasses the state legislature from inside prison, steals the warden's suit and shoes, and escapes to Mexico using only a tiny hammer.

items.title: The Whale (2022)
items.description: A man gets insulted by his estranged daughter for days, causes her to fail an English essay, and finally goes for a walk on his own.
